full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 755 Filed 08/10/22 Page 37 of 262 1742
LC8VMAX2 Shawn - direct
1 Q. Would you please take a look in the binder next to you at what is in evidence as Government Exhibit 11.
2 Let me know when you're there please.
3 A. Yes.
4 Q. Please take a look at the name at the top of that exhibit.
5 Is that Carolyn's full name?
6 A. Yes, ma'am.
7 Q. Okay. You can set that aside. Thank you.
8 About how old was Carolyn when you first started dating her?
9 A. She was 14.
10 Q. About how old were you when you first started dating Carolyn?
11 A. Seventeen.
12 Q. For about how long did you and Carolyn date when she was a teenager?
13 A. Four years, five years.
14 Q. While you were dating Carolyn, how, if at all, did she make money?
15 A. She only had two jobs ever that I know. One was worked at Arby's; and the other, she worked for Jeffrey.
16 Q. Do you know Jeffrey's full name?
17 A. Yes, ma'am.
18 Q. What is it?
19 A. Jeffrey Epstein.
20 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
DOJ-OGR-00013315

text_blocks.content:
Q. Would you please take a look in the binder next to you at what is in evidence as Government Exhibit 11.
Let me know when you're there please.
A. Yes.
Q. Please take a look at the name at the top of that exhibit.
Is that Carolyn's full name?
A. Yes, ma'am.
Q. Okay. You can set that aside. Thank you.
About how old was Carolyn when you first started dating her?
A. She was 14.
Q. About how old were you when you first started dating Carolyn?
A. Seventeen.
Q. For about how long did you and Carolyn date when she was a teenager?
A. Four years, five years.
Q. While you were dating Carolyn, how, if at all, did she make money?
A. She only had two jobs ever that I know. One was worked at Arby's; and the other, she worked for Jeffrey.
Q. Do you know Jeffrey's full name?
A. Yes, ma'am.
Q. What is it?
A. Jeffrey Epstein.

additional_notes: The document appears to be a court transcript with a clear and legible format. The content is a Q&A session between a prosecutor and a witness. The witness discusses their relationship with Carolyn and her employment history, including working for Jeffrey Epstein.
